name: Spinach Salad With Persimmons, Goat Cheese and Walnuts
description: I was never crazy about persimmons until I made this salad with the crunchy Fuyu variety. I love the contrast of sweet persimmons with earthy spinach.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces goat cheese, crumbled about 1/2 cup
1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon fresh lime juice

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the persimmons, and cut in wedges; if there are any seeds at the core, cut away the cores. Combine with the walnuts, goat cheese and spinach in a salad bowl.
Whisk together the lime juice, salt and walnut oil. Toss with the spinach mixture, and serve, sprinkling a tiny amount of fleur de sel over each serving if desired.
